text: @AOC Hey everybody, point and laugh at the idiot. She thinks covid-19 is racist and picks out poor people. Maybe the virus knows the difference between brown,black and white people. I can't believe I breathe the same air as this woman. Hey, @AOC, I'll have whatever you're drinking!
